title: E-Commerce Platform
shortDescription: A full-stack e-commerce solution with modern UI, payment processing, and admin dashboard built with Next.js and TypeScript.
detailedDescription:
This comprehensive e-commerce platform was built from the ground up using Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The application features a modern, responsive design with a complete shopping experience including product catalog, user authentication, shopping cart, and secure payment processing via Stripe.

The platform includes an advanced admin dashboard for inventory management, order tracking, and customer analytics. Built with performance in mind, it achieves excellent Lighthouse scores and provides a seamless user experience across all devices.

Key features include real-time inventory updates, advanced search and filtering, user reviews and ratings, order tracking, and comprehensive analytics dashboard for business insights.
imageAlt: E-commerce platform screenshot showing modern shopping interface

title: Task Management App
shortDescription: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.
detailedDescription:
Built with React, Node.js, and Socket.io, this task management application provides a comprehensive solution for team collaboration. The app features real-time updates, drag-and-drop task organization, file attachments, and advanced filtering options.

The application includes user authentication, role-based permissions, project organization, and detailed analytics. The modern UI is built with Material-UI components and provides an intuitive user experience.

Key features include real-time collaboration, drag-and-drop task boards, file sharing, team chat, deadline tracking, and comprehensive reporting dashboard.
imageAlt: Task management application interface with drag-and-drop functionality

title: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring dark theme, smooth animations, and optimized performance.
detailedDescription:
This portfolio website showcases modern web development practices with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, it features a sophisticated dark theme inspired by GitHub's design system.

The website includes smooth animations, responsive design, SEO optimization, and performance optimization techniques. It demonstrates advanced Next.js features including App Router, Server Components, and Image optimization.

Key features include responsive design, dark theme, smooth animations, SEO optimization, performance optimization, accessibility compliance, and modern UI components.
imageAlt: Portfolio website homepage showing modern dark theme design

title: Weather Dashboard
shortDescription: A comprehensive weather dashboard with real-time data, forecasts, and interactive maps built with React and weather APIs.
detailedDescription:
This weather dashboard provides comprehensive weather information with real-time updates, 7-day forecasts, and interactive maps. Built with React and integrated with multiple weather APIs for accurate data.

The application features location-based weather, detailed forecasts, weather alerts, and historical data visualization. The responsive design works seamlessly across all devices.

Key features include real-time weather updates, location-based forecasts, interactive weather maps, weather alerts, historical data, and responsive design.
imageAlt: Weather dashboard showing current conditions and forecast

title: Blog CMS
shortDescription: A headless CMS for blogging with markdown support, SEO optimization, and content management features.
detailedDescription:
This headless CMS provides a complete blogging solution with markdown support, SEO optimization, and content management features. Built with Next.js and integrated with a headless CMS for content management.

The system includes markdown editing, image optimization, SEO tools, content scheduling, and analytics. The frontend is built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO.

Key features include markdown support, SEO optimization, content scheduling, image optimization, analytics integration, and responsive design.
imageAlt: Blog CMS interface showing content management features

title: API Gateway
shortDescription: A microservices API gateway with authentication, rate limiting, and request routing built with Node.js and Express.
detailedDescription:
This API gateway provides a centralized entry point for microservices with authentication, rate limiting, and request routing. Built with Node.js and Express, it handles thousands of requests per second.

The gateway includes JWT authentication, rate limiting, request logging, error handling, and service discovery. It's designed for high availability and scalability.

Key features include JWT authentication, rate limiting, request routing, service discovery, logging, monitoring, and high availability.
imageAlt: API Gateway architecture diagram showing microservices integration
